description: OPINION AND ORDER.  Griffin's petition for writ of habeas corpus 1 is DENIED.  The Clerk is directed to enter judgment against Griffin and to close this case.  It is further ORDERED that Griffin is not entitled to a certificate of appealability and he is not entitled to appeal in forma pauperis. Signed by Judge Charlene Edwards Honeywell on 9/21/2016. (BGS)

description: MEMORANDUM OPINION as to RICHARD SHUMAKER indicating that, for reasons stated more fully within, Defendant's motion to withdraw his guilty plea  70  is denied.  Defendant's guilty plea was knowingly and voluntarily made and accepted by this  Court.  Moreover, Defendant has failed to present any credible evidence of his alleged innocence or demonstrate any reason sufficient for this Court to permit him to withdraw his guilty plea.  Defendant's sentencing will be scheduled forthwith.  An appropriate Order follows.  Signed by Judge Nora Barry Fischer on 3/28/11.  (jg)
